rules: Rule1: If substance_x is approved, then the regulatory framework is compliant.
Rule2: Provided that data_theta is analyzed, report_iota is reviewed.
Rule3: Whenever report_iota is reviewed, results_kappa are validated.
Rule4: Under the condition that results_kappa are validated, either drug_epsilon has been manufactured or drug_zeta has been imported.
Rule5: Either license_mu has expired or substance_x is not contaminated.
Rule6: In the event that process_xi is audited, then if protocol_nu is compliant, license_mu has not expired.
Rule7: Provided that device_omicron is approved, device_omicron is safe.
Rule8: If device_omicron is approved, then device_omicron is not functional.
Rule9: Either device_omicron is approved or the regulatory framework is compliant.
Rule10: Whenever lab_alpha is authorized, the regulatory framework is compliant.
Rule11: Either component_pi is defective or if device_omicron is safe, then device_omicron is functional.
Rule12: Either operation_sigma is suspended, or authorization_rho is revoked, or license_mu has not expired.
Rule13: If issue_tau is identified, then problem_upsilon is documented.
Rule14: Provided that problem_upsilon is documented, issue_tau is resolved.
Rule15: Whenever fix_phi is implemented, then if issue_tau is resolved, device_omicron is not approved.
Rule16: In the event that solution_chi is verified, then if issue_tau is resolved, device_omicron is not approved.
Rule17: Either case_psi is escalated, fix_phi is implemented, or solution_chi is verified.
Rule18: Either performance_omega is monitored or parameters_aa are adjusted.
Rule19: If application_1 is submitted, then substance_x is approved.
Rule20: Either application_1 is submitted or facility_beta is inspected.
Rule21: Under the condition that parameters_aa are adjusted, if device_omicron is safe, then device_omicron is functional.
Rule22: In the event that system_bb is optimized, then whenever device_omicron is safe, device_omicron is functional.
Rule23: Provided that facility_beta is inspected, device_delta is calibrated.
Rule24: If equipment_gamma is certified, then lab_alpha is authorized.
Rule25: Should device_delta be calibrated, then equipment_gamma is certified.
Rule26: If drug_epsilon is manufactured, then the regulatory framework is compliant.
Rule27: Under the condition that drug_zeta is imported, the regulatory framework is compliant.
Rule28: If sample_eta is tested, then either drug_epsilon has been manufactured or drug_zeta has been imported.
Rule29: Either sample_eta is tested or data_theta is analyzed.
Rule30: If it is not the case that anomaly_cc is reported or that if performance_omega is monitored then system_bb is optimized, then incident_dd is investigated.
Rule31: Should the regulatory framework not be compliant, then substance_x is contaminated.
facts: Fact5: Authorization_rho has not been revoked.
Fact6: Operation_sigma has not been suspended.
Fact7: Case_psi has not been escalated.
Fact8: Anomaly_cc has not been reported.
Fact9: Incident_dd has not been investigated.
